title: House and Land in Kalutara for sale
details:
A modern 2 storied 6 bedrooms, 5 bath rooms, house with boundary walled ½ acre land. 1.8Km from Galle Rd near PTS Aluwihara ground, approx. 40 minutes to Colombo via Expressway.

This new house completed in 2013 is situated in close proximity to Kalutara and Nagoda towns.

Nagoda Public Hospital, Phillips Memorial Hospital, Police Training School, supermarkets, ocean beaches and other amenities are within the radius of two to three kilometers.
• An Architect designed solidly built (using quality material) 2 storied house
• Large 6 bed rooms, with 5 baths (en suite in each floor (2))
• Kitchen with granite pantry top, polished class one timber cupboards and under mount sink.
• Additional detached kitchen with servant facilities (bath, toilet & room)
• An open car porch for two vehicles, entrance lobby with an open balcony
• Security alarm system installed.
• 77 perches (vegetation with matured mango, jackfruit and teak trees)
• Entire land is covered by a 7ft parapet wall strengthened by RCC columns and beams & color washed
• Two gated entrances from nothern and west sides of the land
• An additional outer stairway for the upstairs can be use as two houses/ annex
• Entire house is 9” thick brick masonry, plastered and color washed
• Complete tiled flooring including on all balconies
• Solid wooden interior & exterior, beautifully polished
• SLT telephone, single phase electricity, French windows
• Two iron sliding gates fixed (wired for auto operation) on Northern and Western sides.
• Well and pipe born water with 2 overhead water tanks with street line water connection.
• Hot and cold water plumbing. Additional system for purification of storm and waste water is installed



Ideal for Doctors or expatriates/ foreigner seeking to settle in quiet and village like neighborhood in Sri Lanka.

A very large open space is available for further development, or partition with each gate access, and could be used to build another house, etc.

The land is single owned. Clear deeds, accepted by banks for mortgage loans.
